body:
I want to buy either a Logitech G13 or a Razer Blackwidow Ultimate. Please help me decide!

Some things to help you help me :)
1. Disregard the prices of each.
2. I occasionally game at other places other than my house, but it is very rare.
3. I'm starting to get into FPS games.

Thanks!

title: Blackwidow vs. G13

replies.body:
You know the G13 is just for macros right? Do you mean G15? 

And as long as you don't mind the prominent clickety clack of the Blackwidow green switches, go for it, its such a pretty keyboard.
replies.body_tagged:
You know the G13 is just for macros right? Do you mean G15? 

And as long as you don't mind the prominent clickety clack of the Blackwidow green switches, go for it, its such a pretty keyboard.

replies.body: Shouldn't it be between Logitech G13 & Razer Tartarus? I would personally recommend the Blackwidow since I am a bit of a razer consumer and that it's more flexible considering it's a full keyboard. It's up to you though, search around to find what specs each have and then decide.
replies.body_tagged: Shouldn't it be between Logitech G13 & Razer Tartarus? I would personally recommend the Blackwidow since I am a bit of a razer consumer and that it's more flexible considering it's a full keyboard. It's up to you though, search around to find what specs each have and then decide.

replies.body: The Blackwidow Ultimate isnt exactly the lighest keyboard.
replies.body_tagged: The Blackwidow Ultimate isnt exactly the lighest keyboard.

replies.body: If you get the Blackwidow then get the tournament edition.
replies.body_tagged: If you get the Blackwidow then get the tournament edition.

replies.body:
To all: the products are as listed; I do not mean the G15 or the Tartarus.

If anyone who owns either could give me a description of how it feels, that would be great!

replies.body: I despise Razer keyboards, one reason is that they are overrated and plus made out of plastic.
replies.body_tagged: I despise Razer keyboards, one reason is that they are overrated and plus made out of plastic.

replies.body: I have A BlackWidow Chroma and its Fantastic. Really nice sound, Really confortable and a Really good keyboard. The Normal Blackwidow is the same, It´s just that you won´t have the colors.
